eiteam.esteemedinnovation.api.research

Class ResearchRecipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.oredict.ShapedOreRecipe
      • eiteam.esteemedinnovation.api.research.ResearchRecipe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.item.crafting.IRecipe

    public class ResearchRecipe
extends net.minecraftforge.oredict.ShapedOreRecipe
    The ResearchRecipe is a ShapedOreRecipe that requires research to first be unlocked.

    Well, it actually requires a predicate to match. By default, this predicate will check if the player has unlocked a certain BookPiece. However, using the constructor which passes a TriPredicate allows for any number of checks.

    • Field Detail

      • matcher

        private final TriPredicate<net.minecraft.inventory.InventoryCrafting,net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer,net.minecraft.world.World> matcher
        The predicate used to check if the recipe is valid. When this is executed, it already checks that the shape is valid, and the player is not null (e.g., autocrafting).

        The predicate passes the current InventoryCrafting, the EntityPlayer crafting it, and the World they are currently in.

      • eventHandlerField

        private static final java.lang.reflect.Field eventHandlerField

      • ResearchRecipe

        public ResearchRecipe(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack result,
                      TriPredicate<net.minecraft.inventory.InventoryCrafting,net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer,net.minecraft.world.World> matcher,
                      java.lang.Object... recipe)
        Provides a new ResearchRecipe with a custom predicate.
        Parameters:
        result - The output ItemStack.
        matcher - The predicate (see matcher).
        recipe - The recipe shape (see ShapedOreRecipe).

      • ResearchRecipe

        public ResearchRecipe(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack result,
                      java.lang.String requiredBookPieceName,
                      java.lang.Object... recipe)
        Provides a new ResearchRecipe with the default predicate. This predicate checks that the player has unlocked a particular BookPiece (see BookPiece.isUnlocked(EntityPlayer)), whose unlocalized name is passed.
        Parameters:
        result - The output ItemStack.
        requiredBookPieceName - The unlocalized name for the BookPiece to be checked against.
        recipe - The recipe shape (see ShapedOreRecipe).

      • getCurrentPlayer

        private net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer getCurrentPlayer(net.minecraft.inventory.InventoryCrafting inv)
        Gets the player currently crafting this recipe.
        Parameters:
        inv - The current crafting inventory
        Returns:
        The player, or null if there either is no player, or they are using a weird crafting table we don't know about.
